metadata.name: lancon_billard_chaudhari
metadata.description: Binary 2d Lennard-Jones mixture forming a quasi-crystal for N_L/N_S=(1+5**0.5)/4
metadata.notes: The original model actually used a Johnson potential, which was later replaced with the Lennard-Jones one by Widom, Strandburg, Swendsen PRL 1987; the cutoff was not reported in the original paper, the one used here comes from Falk and Langer PRE 57, 7192 (1998).
